ComicInfo.Summary: The high-octave excitement continues in May as the F5 crew find out how alone they are in a world of double-crossing spies and secret weapons. They uncover that the president of a German Bio-Development company will stop at nothing to attain the world's newest entry into the "weapons of mass destruction" list. Penny and the rest of F5 must find and secure this deadly new substance and return it to its rightful owners...the U.S. Airforce! There's no room for mistakes now! It's life or death in F5! Wall to wall action, jam packed with characters you care about. F5 the MUST SEE book of 2000! 32 pages, full color by Image Comics. Created, written and penciled by Tony Daniel, Inks by Rich Bonk and Kevin Conrad, colors by Steve Firchow.
